title: Barn Joo Union Square
address: 35 Union Square W, New York, NY 10003, United States

items.name: Homemade Pickles
items.description: Pickled Mix Vegetables (Carrot, Cauliflower, Radish, Cucumber.)

items.name: Homemade Kimchi
items.description: Fermented Nappa cabage with chilli/shrimp paste. ⚠Not Vegan.

items.name: Fisherman's Noodle
items.description: {SPICY} BEEF broth, blue crab, mussels, shrimp, mix seafood, ramen noodles.

items.name: Japche
items.description: Sweet potato glass noodles stir-fry with vegetables.

items.name: Kimchi Creamy Shrimp
items.description: {Spicy} Shrimp, Kimchi, Bechamel, Mushrooms, Heavy Cream, Chili Oil, Mix Seafood, Fish Roe & Udon.

items.name: Yukgaejang Ramen
items.description: {SPICY} Shredded beef, beef broth, bracken, bean sprout, egg, scallion, ramen noodles.

items.name: Braised Short Ribs
items.description: p. a. Amish grass fed short ribs, pine-nuts, chestnuts, mushroom, peppers, sweet potato puree, kabocha squash.

items.name: Chili Shrimp
items.description: Shrimp, fresh corn, parmesan, sweet potato crunch, onion, zucchini, lemon aioli, sour cream.

items.name: Sundubu Soup
items.description: Beef broth, kimchi, ramen noodle, ham, sausage, meatball, mixed vegetables, mixed mushroom, mozzarella cheese, spinach, sunny side up egg.

items.name: Pork Belly
items.description: Pickled onion, white kimchi, pickled cabbage, chayote pickles, pico de gallo, ssamjang sauce, chicharron.

items.name: Braised Octopus
items.description: Octopus, marble potatoes, black bean, shishito peppers, ginger, bean sprouts, gochujang chili sauce.

items.name: New York Bites
items.description: Marinated short rib, marble potatoes, sweet potato crunch, grilled lemon, kabocha squash, hemp seeds, butter sautéed mushrooms.

items.name: Kimchi Fried Rice
items.description: Kimchi, spicy pork, mixed veggies, fried quinoa, mozzarella cheese, sunny side up egg.

items.name: Sashimi Bibimbap
items.description: { cold } Salmon, tuna, white fish, fish roe, fried quinoa, caramelized kimchi, micro greens, pickled radish & pico de gallo.

items.name: Stone Bowl Bibimbap
items.description: Five grain, purple rice with broccoli, carrots, radish, zucchini, mushrooms, bean sprouts, fried quinoa, sunny side up egg.

items.name: Tiger Roll
items.description: Tuna, salmon, avocado, pickled radish, kani, topped with eel sauce & spicy mayo.

items.name: Tacos (D)
items.description: Served with lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo, sour cream and limes.

items.name: Shrimp Tempura Roll
items.description: Shrimp tempura, avocado, pickled radish, kani, sweet potato crunch, fish roe, topped with eel sauce & spicy mayo

items.name: Potato Croquette
items.description: Fried mashed potatoes with green peas and carrots with Korean demigras sauce (3pcs)

items.name: Barn Joo Salad
items.description: Quinoa, black bean, mixed greens, seasonal fruits, hard-boiled egg, almonds, asparagus, yuzu-ginger dressing.

items.name: Tuna Mayo Tartare
items.description: { cold } Tuna, pickled radish, sesame oil, mayo, honey with crostini.

items.name: Bulgogi Spicy Rice Cake
items.description: Rice cake, gochujang, kabocha squash, onions, peppers, almonds, sesame seed, scallion, carrots.

items.name: Calamari & Peanuts
items.description: fried calamari, peanuts, paprika, tartar sauce

items.name: Tteok & Cheese
items.description: Rice cake, sweet corn, quinoa, fontina, cheddar, parmesan cheese, truffle essence, crostini

items.name: Wings
items.description: Choice of: Soy Garlic | Hot & Spicy | Citrus Flavor.

items.name: Popcorn Chicken
items.description: chicken thigh, black sesame seed, roasted peanuts, béchamel sauce

items.name: Salmon Tartare
items.description: (Cold) Lemon, Cucumber, Pickle Radish, Mayo, Guacamole, Fish Roe With Crostini.

items.name: Buns
items.description: {2 Pieces} Scallion coleslaw, pickled radish, cucumber, tartar sauce.

items.name: Korean Pancake
items.description: Served with mix green salad and yuzu dressing.

items.name: Mushrooms
items.description: garlic butter, mushrooms: oyster, cremini, shiitake

items.name: Crunchy Tofu
items.description: fried tofu with a spicy glaze and caramelized kimchi

items.name: Truffle Fries
items.description: Hand cut potato, granulated garlic, and truffle essence.

items.name: Shrimp Tempura
items.description: Panko, Lemon Aioli, Tartar Sauce, Pico De Gallo

items.name: Fried Asparagus
items.description: Sesame seeds and asparagus with spacy mayo.
